sentences.en: After why pulling a head cannot deflate?
sentences.cn: 为什么拉完头后不能放气?

sentences.en: But investors now think China might, somehow , be able to make a bubble deflate slowly.
sentences.cn: 但目前投资者认为,中国或许能够设法让泡沫慢慢缩小.

sentences.en: Deflate the  tire and then inflate it afresh.
sentences.cn: 把轮胎的气放掉,然后重新充上气.

sentences.en: For only thus can we deflate the enemy's arrogance and raise the people's morale.
sentences.cn: 只有如此,才能使敌焰下降,民气大伸.

sentences.en: He refuses to accept any theory that attempts to either deflate it or reduce it.
sentences.cn: 他不接受任何企图贬低[真理]或将它化约至其他概念的理论.

sentences.en: Like any actor he can be self-centred but I think I've worked out how to deflate him.
sentences.cn: 跟其他演员一样，他有时也会以自我为中心，但我想自己已经找到了如何挫他锐气的办法。

sentences.en: Nothing could deflate his ego / pomposity , ie make him less self - assured or pompous.
sentences.cn: 任何事都不能削弱他的自信心[气焰].

sentences.en: One sharp remark is enough deflate her.
sentences.cn: 一句尖锐的话足以使她泄气.

sentences.en: She was deflated when Fen made no comment on her achievement.
sentences.cn: 芬对她的成就没作任何评论，她很泄气。

sentences.en: That is unlikely to deflate him.
sentences.cn: 这种言论不会让他泄气的.

sentences.en: The up - regulating of required reserve ratio will deflate money supply.
sentences.cn: 上调准备金率势必将紧缩货币供应量.

sentences.en: This document describes how to use the PPP Deflate compression compression PPP agreement Packaging paper reported.
sentences.cn: 本文档描述了如何使用PPPDeflate压缩协议压缩PPP封装报文.

sentences.en: We breathe out simply by relaxing the diaphragm; the lungs deflate like balloons.
sentences.cn: 我们呼气其实就是简单的隔膜松弛下来, 肺就像气球一样缩小了.

sentences.en: We deflate the tyres to make it easier to cross the desert.
sentences.cn: 我们把轮胎放了气，以便穿越沙漠时更容易一些。

sentences.en: When it returns to shore, the life-jacket will deflate and revert to a harness.
sentences.cn: 返回岸上后，救生衣就会瘪掉，恢复成背带状。

sentences.en: You could blow it up just like a balloon, and deflate it while not using.
sentences.cn: 不用的时候可以像薄薄的一张纸片一样收起来.

words.tran_cn: 紧缩指数；平减物价指数；扣除通货膨胀因素的价格指数
抽气；使泄气（deflate的过去式和过去分词）
放气；使缩小；紧缩通货；打击；使泄气

trans.tran_cn: 使(轮胎)瘪下去 降低重要性
trans.tran_en: if a tyre,  balloon  etc deflates, or if you deflate it, it gets smaller because the gas inside it comes out
